participant_1.name: Jordan
participant_1.personality: Inquisitive and nurturing, Jordan has a keen interest in learning and helping others.
participant_1.background: I want a home with a large enough space to host my tutoring sessions. I don t like acting. my parents are both over age 100. I keep my blue and hazel eyes open and take mental notes of the world around me. My family is a family of storytellers, and we are all passionate about sharing our stories with the world.

participant_2.name: Sam
participant_2.personality: Compassionate and practical, Sam enjoys spending quality time with his loved ones and caring for animals.
participant_2.background: I love spending time with my dog, he is the best friend I could ever ask for. I enjoy taking care of animals and using my nice office supplies. i have been married eight years. I've had to rescue people who were caught in riptides. i am content with my life.

content.text: Hey there, I'm a dog person too! What's your favorite breed?
I love all dogs but I do have a soft spot for yorkies. They're so cute and cuddly!
I've never actually met a yorkie before! What's it like to have one as a pet?
They're great! They're really easy to train and they're always up for a cuddle.
That sounds perfect! I'm going to have to look into getting one someday.
What else do you like to do for fun?
I love taking care of animals and using my nice office supplies.
Oh, that's cool! I've always wanted to work with animals but I'm not sure what kind of job I would want.
There are so many different options! You could be a vet, a trainer, a groomer, or even a wildlife rehabilitator.
That's true, I'll have to do some more research.
I'm sure you'll find something you love!
